title: Georgia’s Brad Raffensperger Again at Center of Election Fight
sub_head: The secretary of state is among several top election officials around the country targeted for defeat in 2022 by Trump supporters
body:
ATLANTA—When President Donald Trump narrowly lost Georgia in the 2020 presidential election, he demanded that Republican Secretary of State Brad Raffensperger invalidate the results. Mr. Raffensperger refused.
Now Mr. Trump and his supporters want to get payback by ousting Georgia’s top election official—and they have their sights set on other states as well.
